description:
CapsLockX - like hackers as computer operation 💻

CapsLockX is a modular hotkey script engine based on AutoHotkey. Allows you to easily operate the computer efficiently like a hacker in a movie without leaving the keyboard with both hands . There are a lot of functions that you can understand at a touch and are super easy to use: editing enhancement, virtual desktop and window management, mouse simulation, in-app hotkey enhancement, JS mathematical expression calculation, and other super multi-functions are waiting for you to personally define. Main warehouse address🏠: https://github.com/snolab/CapsLockX

jsdelivr_NPM jsdelivr_GITHUB Downloads-From-GitHub-Releases

gh-pages NPM

Getting started tutorial📖
Too long to watch / TL;DR 📄
Download this compressed package: download JSDelivrCDN-release package.zip

After unpacking, open CapsLockX.exe, had lost the simple novice tutorial, then press and hold CapsLockX, then press the WASDmouse move, QEclick RFwheel, HJKLthe cursor moves, YOUImove a page, ZXCVwindow management, 1234567890switching virtual desktops, Mopen configuration.

Installation and use🛠
Green portable program package (for novices, stable version) 📦
The source code packaging is the software body, no need to compile, the pure green portable software is decompressed and used. Source code + program package, the first one (fastest) is recommended.

Download JSDelivrCDN-release package.zip
Alternative download CloudFlareCDN-release package.zip
Alternative download GitHub-release package.zip
Alternative download GitHub-warehouse package.zip
Alternative download BitBucket-warehouse package.zip
Alternative download for Chinese mainland users-Gitee-warehouse package.zip (login required)
You can use after decompression, starting from the start of the methods: Double-click CapsLockX.exeto start the script, To add startup items, in the Start menu - Run enter shell: startup and then create a shortcut to this program, thrown back on.

Command line installation (recommended by advanced users, can be automatically updated) 🖥️
Choose one of the following options, users in mainland China recommend the first (fastest), users in other regions recommend the second

git clone https://gitee.com/snomiao/CapslockX && .\CapsLockX\CapsLockX.exe
git clone https://github.com/snolab/CapsLockX && .\CapsLockX\CapsLockX.exe
npm i -g capslockx && npx capslockx
npx capslockx
choco install capslockx --version=1.14.30 && capslockx (Note: 2021-04-21 chocolatey package is still under review)
User Manual📖
Press and hold CapsLockto enter CapsLockX mode, then your keyboard would be like Vim as the default mode of function keyboard (keys below
CapsLockX loads some commonly used modules by default, and the functions and usage methods are listed below. For unnecessary modules, you can directly delete ./Modulesthe corresponding directory .ahkfile, then press the Ctrl + Alt + \reload can be.

You can also write your own my-ahk.user.ahkand put it ./User/in the directory, CapsLockX will automatically recognize and load them.
summary: Operate the computer like a hacker! Operate the computer like a **hacker**! CapsLockX allows you to easily operate the computer **efficient** without leaving the keyboard, just like the **hacker** in the movie. There are a lot of functions that you can understand at a glance and are super easy to use: editing enhancement, virtual desktop and window management, mouse simulation, in-app hotkey enhancement, JS mathematical expression calculation, and other super multi-functions are waiting for you to define. 像**黑客**一样操作电脑！CapsLockX 让你可以轻轻松松像电影里的**黑客**一样，双手不离开键盘，**高效率**地操作电脑。这里有超多一摸就懂超好上手的功能：编辑增强、虚拟桌面与窗口管理、鼠标模拟、应用内热键增强、JS 数学表达式计算、等超多功能等你来定义。
author: snomiao
